snippet: Catholic officials in Minnesota pledged on Monday to enact new procedures to help protect children from sexual abuse by the clergy.
abstract: Catholic officials in Minnesota pledge to enact new procedures to help protect children from sexual abuse by the clergy as they reveal some terms of settlement for 2013 lawsuit brought by man who had been abused by priest when he was teenage altar boy.
lead_paragraph: Catholic officials in Minnesota pledged on Monday to enact new procedures to help protect children from sexual abuse by the clergy.

headline.main: Settlement in Lawsuit Over Priest Abuse Is Revealed
headline.print_headline: Settlement in Lawsuit Over Priest Abuse Is Revealed
